DOC.detailed_description: At first visit IVF-clinic CRF ( CRF=Case Report Form ) demographic fill regard age , BMI , parity , presence PCOS ( PCOS=polycystic ovarian syndrome ) , smoke duration infertility blood sample serum-AMH take frozen later analysis . The serum-AMH level constant menstrual period ( La Marca et al 2006 ) blood sample take cycle day . The AMH assay use Beckman Coulter AMH Gene II assay . Classification serum AMH value expect low- , normal- , high ovarian response base data present large prospective cohort study patient go COH ( Nelson et al 2009 ) . Since publication use old assay reference interval calculate translated described recent publication AMH assay ( Nelson et al 2012 ) . Serum-AMH level increase GnRH ( GnRH= gonadotropin release hormone ) agonist downregulation ( Jayaprakasan et al 2008 ) , thus blood sample preferably take start down-regulation . A long GnRH agonist treatment protocol use . Patients down-regulated GnRH agonist luteal phase , first cycle day anovulatory patient , estradiol < 200 pmol/l . After down-regulation , assessment AFC perform sonography , patient randomize . For patient randomize AMH-group calculation gonadotropin start dose make algorithm include age , BMI , AFC serum-AMH . For patient randomize non-AMH-group , calculation gonadotropin start dose make algorithm include age , BMI AFC . The AMH blood sample group analyze completion study . Stimulation start dose rFSH ( rFSH=recombinat follicle stimulate hormone ) calculate accord dose algorithm use two group . The name gonadotropin preparation , dose number treatment day record . The applies drug use . Monitoring perform mandatory estradiol day stimulation start stimulation day 6 . The dose gonodotropin adjust day 7 . If estradiol > 1200 pmol/l dose reduce one step accord dose algorithm . If estradiol < 350 pmol/l dose increase one step accord dose algorithm . Vaginal sonography perform stimulation day 9-11 estimate number size follicle . The number follicles > 10 mm sonography 0-2 day ovulation induction record . Ovulation induction 6500 IU ( IU=international unit ) rHCG ( rHCG=recombinant human chorion gonadotropin ) give > =2 follicles > =17 mm . 36 hour ovulation induction transvaginal oocyte pickup perform accord standard procedure clinic use sedation paracervical administration local anaesthetic , follicle > 10 mm puncture . The oocyte fertilize use standard IVF procedure . In case unexpected poor semen sample day ovum pick-up microinjection perform . The fertilization rate record . Embryo transfer do day 2 3 accord routine procedure clinic . In case GQE ( GQE=good quality embryo ) allow perform double embryo transfer , otherwise single embryo transfer mandatory . Luteal phase support use vaginal route give day embryo transfer 14 day , pregnancy test ( urinary ) . In case impend OHSS ( OHSS=ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ) , decision make cryopreserve embryo , outcome first transfer cryopreserved embryo include study result secondary endpoint . In case pregnancy , early vaginal sonography perform pregnancy week 7-8 . The number cancel cycle due poor response record .
